name: Mr. Squeak Strikes Again
description:
Mr Squeak Strikes Again is a fast paced platforming game in which your goal is simple: keep the big guy from getting to work on time! Hide behind objects, pick up his keys, wallet and other important items and ensure that you cause as much chaos as possible.

Global Game Jam 2021

Credits:

Programming - Chris Maire (@dinosaursssssss), Nicholas Yang and Elena Kosowski (@lennie_ok)

Art and Animation - Cole Thompson (@colethegiant) and Gem (@gemhunter178)

Music and Sound - Miles Acquaviva (@link5669)

Original Concept - Cole Thompson (@colethegiant)
